ygData.subject: Broken Minotaur Lord's Horn
ygData.msgSnippet: I was helping a friend take down the Mino Hero earlier today, and he dropped a Broken Minotaur Lord s Horn. At the time, I was on as my higher level druid, and
ygData.messageBody:
I was helping a friend take down the Mino Hero earlier today, and he dropped
a Broken Minotaur Lord's Horn. At the time, I was on as my higher level
druid, and I let a young bard loot it instead. I did some research
afterwards and found that it's used in a shadowknight quest for Darkforge
armor, but I was wondering if it actually has any effects when used as an
instrument.

Having never seen one of these before, I did a bit of research and found
that it adds +10 to poison resists, but no word if it actually affects wind
songs by any significant increase. Anyone know?

Thanks. :)

Sonnett
